committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to redesignate Capulin Mountain National Monument as Capulin Volcano National Monument in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Redesignates the Capulin Mountain National Monument, New Mexico, as the Capulin Volcano National Monument. Transfers jurisdiction over the federally owned lands within the revised boundaries of the Monument to the National Park Service.

titles.title: A bill to redesignate Capulin Mountain National Monument as Capulin Volcano National Monument in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
